Package org.garret.perst

Class Bitmap

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.garret.perst.Bitmap
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Iterable

    public class Bitmap
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Iterable
    Class used to merge results of multiple databases searches. Each bit of bitmap corresponds to object OID. and/or/xor method can be used to combine different bitmaps.
